title: Game crashes after Championselect
body:
Hello.
Since yesterday, my game is crashing after the championselect.
That doesn´t allow me to play LoL and i already got a leaverbuster. FeelsBadMan
I´ve already reinstalled it and deactivated my firewall.
Nothing works.
Help pls {{champion:32}}

replies.body: Great, thanks for the info!  As a first step, disable any third party programs if you have any running like play.tv or recorder.  They can tend to cause issues with the client and crash, especially after a patch.  I also recommend going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide in case there is a corruption with your game files or driver problem causing this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I'd like to help but not sure what you mean exactly by crashing.  Are you receiving any errors?  What are you seeing exactly as the crash happens?  Let me know!

It´s the typical Bugsplat Error. When i´m closing the Bugsplat-window there is the Client with the "Reconnect-Button". When i´m clicking on this button the game is crashing and there is the Bugsplat-Window again with the same client.
